short_description: smart aluminium is a windows & door shop based in nottingham, united kingdom.
long_description: our attractive shopfront systems create a modern, fresh and professional appearance on any high street, retail or business park. the pure window range is a revolutionary new range of aluminium windows which uses an innovative, enhanced thermal barrier manufactured from expanded polyurethane (pur) allowing ultra-low u-values to be achieved and a life expectancy in excess of 40 years. we offer a range of products and services including curtain walling, shop fronts, windows and bi-folding doors. each product is individually made to order, providing you with a comprehensive range of options including style and design. as a specialist in the design, build & installation of curtain walling & aluminium windows & doors smart aluminium ltd has the qualities & services needed to add value to any project, this includes technical expertise, industry experience & a clear chain of command throughout the company. we operate nationally from our centrally located base in nottinghamshire & we work in a variety of sectors including retail developments, hospitals, schools & universities, residential & commercial buildings.

generated_description: smart aluminium, legally known as smart aluminium ltd., is a company based in nottingham, england, specializing in the design, build, and installation of curtain walling, shop fronts, windows, and bi-folding doors for both commercial and residential markets. established in 2012, the company operates nationally and serves various sectors including retail developments, hospitals, schools, universities, residential, and commercial buildings. is known for its high-quality products and comprehensive services, which include technical expertise and industry experience. the company maintains strong relationships with key main contractors and suppliers, ensuring efficient supply chain management and repeat business.
